name: Asteroid Assimilation
description:
Left click to guide in space ship, space to enter pod.

Navigate to asteroids, mine using shift and shoot enemies with left click

Press 'e' on some consoles to activate

Watch your fuel and health!

Press 'enter' while on the cruise ship to enter and explore!

If you have difficulty finding asteroids, just keep flying around! One is sure to find its way to you eventually, but it won't if you're staying still
